name: Catsandcottagecrafts
introduction: Hello! My name is Lacey (I also go by Lace), and I like to crochet! I also like to attach pictures of my cat along with my work, so be ready to see a kitty. I do this as a hobby and want to spread the joys of cute, fluffy stuffed animals with everyone. Iâ€™m also open to talking to people about my art or other things in general, so feel free to reach out!

introduction: Howdy! I am a 22 year old artist with a love for games! I draw loads of things, from DnD related content, Nintendo to other beloved games! Check me out if my art tickles your tastebuds or to just say hi!

name: issy / inari
introduction: Hi everyone! My name is Issy and I use they/them pronouns. I am a third year art major and this is my second time tabling at Slug Con! I am mainly a digital artist that does character art and occasionally animations. I spend a lot of my time sketching rather than making finished pieces. I dabble here and there in fanart as well. I'm super excited to have a booth here again. I hope you enjoy my works! :D

name: PapaPaint546
introduction: Hello everyone I'm not good at digital art, so I've put together some things I hope people enjoy. My main focus is painting characters I love, but I also have other things like pins, a sticker, keychain and some beanies...the beanies aren't in the store yet.

name: âˆ‘sion (Esion)
introduction:
UCSC General Biology Alumni currently working in a public health laboratory! While in UCSC I collaborated a lot with game designers as an artist on several teams, with the most recent being Bond: Wish of the Forest. (Shout out to the really cool GDA people).

By collaborating on various games I got to learn a lot about art and gain new techniques and tools to experiment with.

name: Madison Li
introduction:
Hello! My name is Madison, and I'm a 2nd year CS:GD student. This will be my first time vendoring at Slugcon, but I'm very excited to participate! I am mainly a digital artist (Clip Studio Paint Pro + Procreate) and I usually draw original character illustrations of both my and my friends' OCs. I'm hoping to work on more fanart in the future!

My interests usually revolve around rhythm games (Project Sekai currently! which intersects a bit with:), vocaloid music, and RPGMaker horror games. I also like designing original characters with friends :)

My commissions are currently closed, but I plan to open them sometime during the summer.

name: NoxTarrOwl
introduction:
Hello! I'm Max (he/him) 3rd year exchange student from England!

Some of you may remember me from the Winter art fest (this will be my second and final time tabling at UCSC). There's some new prints this time with all the ones I had last time also returning! Everything will be available in 6x4!

Check out my socials if you want to see more art and such! It's a lot of weird original stuff with some animations thrown in there. Looking forward to seeing you all at SlugCon!

 If you see something you're interested in, you may pre-order artprints here!: https://forms.gle/QZqd36LsJyMiS2Ft8 
Otherwise, you may check me out on my socials~ 
Thanks and see you there! ;;DDD

name: ami.crafts.and.charms
introduction: Hello! My name is Amirah, and I like to make things out of clay. I took a sculpture and ceramics class in high school, and Iâ€™ve stuck with sculpting ever since. My favorite things to make are miniature animals, but earrings with charms seem to be the most popular at festivals and shows. Iâ€™m super excited for Slug Con, and I canâ€™t wait to see all the amazing art in person! I didnâ€™t table at Slug Con last year, but I went to some of the events and had a blast!

name: Pareidolia
introduction: Hey everyone! I'm Vika, a recent AGPM grad, AKA the jojo lady. Come stop by if you wanna get some cool prints and stickers, check out a comic I'm working on, or just chat! I'd love to meet as many of you as possible. Hope everyone has an awesome week ;)

name: Crocheting Cuttlefish

name: Kogetsu?Hatena
introduction: Hi everyone! My name is Kogetsu?Hatena, a 4th year CS:Game Design! I'm an aspiring artist and game designer, and I'm excited to participate in SlugCon! Hope to see you there! In the mean time, here's some of my old works, and stay tuned for some more at SlugCon :D
